entry.title: Wednesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 3.

entry.title: Thursday: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 4.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Becoming mainly cloudy late in the morning. Clearing late in the afternoon. Wind becoming southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 near noon. High plus 4. Wind chill minus 16 in the morning. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Wednesday 11 January 2023
